Title: Limits the substitution of abuse-deterrent analgesic opioid drug products for analgesic opioids lacking such technology
Summary: Provides for patient access to FDA approved abuse-deterrent technology to help combat opioid abuse.
LawCode: Amd ยง273, Pub Health L; add ยง3216-a, Ins L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law and the insurance law, in relation to the use of abuse-deterrent technology for opioids as a mechanism for reducing abuse and diversion of opioid drugs
